title: Comparative Study Design on the Educational Effects of Web/Game-Based Music Appreciation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A comparative pedagogy research-based course for current practitioners to enhance music appreciation teaching methods.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the historical/cultural context of musical works and explain it with 80% accuracy
Learners can comparatively evaluate musical elements (harmony, rhythm, instrumentation) at least three times in web/game-based learning environments
Learners can present at least two differences in preferences and interpretations using A/B testing methods after music appreciation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
